name: Lisa (Peach)
description: Hand molded and cast in polyurethane resin from an original sculpture. Each one is hand made. 9" (23 cm) tall. Polyurethane resin, acrylic, gold rings Limited edition. Ships in 5-10 business days. Because each toy is handmade, they may slightly vary from the one pictured. While we try to minimize air bubbles, mold lines, and imperfections, they are a natural part of the handmade process. Not suitable for children

name: Jodie
description: One of a kind original sculpture. Hand painted and signed by Jon Knox. Polymer clay, sterling silver armature, aluminum armature, acrylic, and gold leaf. 9" tall International orders for original sculptures are required to ship via Express Mail.

name: Mutant Rabbit Tee
description: Printed on American Apparel with crazy-soft water-based inks. Tags removed and garment info printed on the inside. You can't even feel the ink - sooo comfy! Limited edition.

name: Cody (Black)
description:
Cody is my first major vinyl toy release. He is articulated at the neck and shoulders and comes with interchangeable magnetic eyes so you can change his face whenever you like!
  • 21 cm / 8 inches tall
  • Cast from an original sculpt by Jon Knox
  • Produced by ExtendedPlayz, a division of Bonustoyz.
  • Art direction by Ajee.
Eye Variations:
International orders are shipped via Priority Mail to ensure reliable delivery. Orders to the United Kingdom require Express Mail International. Also available at the Bonustoyz shop. (France)

name: Boy in Gingham Greeting Card
description: Just in time for the holidays and winter weather, this card features the Boy in Gingham drawing. The inside of the card is blank, so it will work for any occasion year round. Comes with kraft paper bag style envelope. Size: A6 (4.5" x 6.25") Printed on 80# eco-white cover stock. Each card comes packaged in a clear resealable sleeve with its envelope.

name: Danny version 2
description:
ALL DONE! THANK YOU, EVERYBODY!!!

Hand-cast in polyurethane resin, hand-painted with acrylic. Key lime green shirt. Box is completely hand drawn, each one is unique. Available first to newsletter subscribers. Public release at a later date is possible, but not guaranteed.

update: Danny version 2 will not be available to the public. He will only be available to newsletter subscribers. Sales still run through August 18th until midnight. Thank you everyone!

Danny is sculpted, cast, and painted by me in my studio. He may have some minor imperfections.

name: Danny version 1
description:
Hand-cast in polyurethane resin and hand-painted. Each one comes with it's own unique hand-drawn box. 8.5 inches tall. Signed and numbered edition of 5. * SOLD OUT * Thank you everyone!! Release date: Monday June 15, 2009. 1pm west coast time.
These are hand-made by me in my studio. This means you can expect some airbubbles and imperfect lines, so purchase only if you're into that sort of thing. If you wanna be the first to know when the next toy is released, join the mailing list at the bottom of this page! (Don't worry, you won't be spammed and e-mails only go out to announce new toys!)

name: Bobby version 2
description: The second color variant of Bobby. Packaged in a clear zip bag, signed on the bottom of his foot. Includes a signed 4" x 5.5" sketch and a 1-inch Bobby button! **SOLD OUT** Thank you everyone!!!!! Release date: Friday, July 31 at 1pm (pacific time) Bobby is sculpted, cast, and painted by me in my studio. He may have some minor imperfections.

name: My Little Arpie (v2)
description: The 2nd version of My Little Arpie, cast in polyurethane resin. Each one is individually hand painted, and signed. Packaged in a zip bag with a header card. The figure is 3.25" tall. ** 1 PER CUSTOMER PER COLOR, PLEASE ** (that means up to 4 per person) Sales open October 14th @ 3pm (pacific) and close October 16th @ 11:59pm. This release will be made to order. Please allow at least 3 weeks for your toy to be made. I finish them as quickly as possible, but the process is time-consuming, so please be patient. These are handmade, so air bubbles and minor imperfections are to be expected. Please join the e-mail list above to receive reminders for future toy releases!

name: My Little Arpie (v2) Clear
description: The 2nd version of My Little Arpie, cast in clear urethane resin. Each one is individually hand painted, signed, and numbered. Packaged in a zip bag with a header card. The figure is 3.25" tall. ** SOLD OUT, THANK YOU EVERYONE!! ** Release date October 14th @ 3pm (pacific) If you order the opaque version, both toys will ship together. These are handmade, so air bubbles and minor imperfections are to be expected. Please join the e-mail list above to receive reminders for future toy releases!

name: Custom Jake
description:
Get a 1 of a kind Jake. Click here to see a larger image. The number on the bottom right is the number to select in the drop down menu above. You may order as many as you like, but there is only 1 of each color available. If you successfully add the item to your cart, then it is reserved for you shortly so you have time to add additional items to your cart before checking out. Just navigate back to this page if you wish to pick up an additional Jake, after adding the previous one to your cart. Release date: April 17, 2009. 12pm west coast time. Hand-cast in polyurethane resin and hand-painted. 6.5 inches tall. Signed and numbered (each one is unique).
These are hand-made by me in my studio. This means you can expect some airbubbles and imperfect lines, so purchase only if you're into that sort of thing. If you wanna be the first to know when the next toy is released, join the mailing list at the bottom of this page! (Don't worry, you won't be spammed and e-mails only go out to announce new toys!)

name: Bobby Custom
description:
Another unannounced release. First custom of my upcoming toy Bobby. This color variant is one of a kind. Hand-cast in polyurethane resin and hand-painted. 4.5 inches tall. Signed and numbered.
These are hand-made by me in my studio. This means you can expect some airbubbles and imperfect lines, so purchase only if you're into that sort of thing. If you wanna be the first to know when the next toy is released, join the mailing list at the bottom of this page! (Don't worry, you won't be spammed and e-mails only go out to announce new toys!)

name: Jeffrey Toy / Print Set
description: *one set per customer, please! only a few left! Release date: November 20, 2008. Hellobrute.com exclusive. Each Jeffrey comes with a signed and numbered 4" x 5.5" print produced by Letter Pressed! Toy: Edition of 25. Print: Edition of 50. $75 gets you a print and a toy. Hand-cast in polyurethane resin and hand-painted. 7 inches tall. Each toy and print is signed and numbered. Bagged with header card. One set per customer please! (Prints are also available separately for $12 + shipping.) These are hand-made by me in my studio. This means you can expect some airbubbles and imperfect lines, so purchase only if you're into that sort of thing. If you wanna be the first to know when the next toy is released, join the mailing list at the bottom of this page! (Don't worry, you won't be spammed and e-mails only go out to announce new toys!)
